title: 166: Machiavelli's "The Prince" 2: Pie Fortress
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: This is the second half of A.J.'s series on Machiavelli's "The Prince." It addresses how a prince can establish a reputation. We also chat about pie.
itunes:author: Cherry, Apple, and American
itunes:subtitle: When the people hate you, just eat pie
